title: Joe Biden Chooses Brian Deese as Top Economic Adviser
sub_head: Former Obama adviser to direct National Economic Council; his post doesn’t require Senate confirmation
body:
WASHINGTON—President-elect Joe Biden has chosen Brian Deese, a former adviser to Barack Obama, to be the director of the National Economic Council, according to people familiar with the matter.
In his new post, which doesn’t require Senate confirmation, Mr. Deese will play a lead role in implementing Mr. Biden’s economic agenda, with a focus on rebuilding the economy amid a pandemic that has devastated many U.S. businesses and resulted in millions of lost jobs.
